posts.post_title: FS: T206 TY COBB Red Portrait SGC
posts.post_content:
Presents very well for the grade.  Asking $495 delivered.  My email is [url]poorlydrawncat@gmail.com[/url].

thank you poorlydrawncat, and thank you net54.

Derek
